page.title: 16Names of children involved
page.content: {GIRLS BOYS Andrea Clarke Paul Sheppard Clare Checketts Mark Kyte Rebecca Barningham Nicholas Sanders Cheryl Portman Darron Harris Emma Baylis Max Myers Rosanne Elliker Russell Collins Claire Worrall Luke Charles Michelle Lee Giles Checketts Sian Johnson Dean Hine Joanna Waterhouse Gavin Parrott Victoria Price Ian Phillips Ellie Baylis Oliver Cox Lisa Griffiths Darren Preece Amy Baylis Lee Thomas Simon Sheppard Richard Ransome These are the children of{Class 2 Ombersley Endowed First School in July 1985.They worked with their teacher and three students from Worcester College of Education on this project.
